tool.name: Mantel
tool.description: Mantel correlation coefficient between two matrices.

param.name: method
param.label: method - pearson, spearman, or kendall. Default: pearson

param.name: iters
param.label: iters - Number of random configuration to try (default 1000)

tool.help:

**Command Documentation**
The mantel_ command calculates the Mantel correlation coefficient between two matrices_.
